<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Tax Accountant

Location: Detroit Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Consulting, Strategy/Planning

Description:
Our client is looking for a LEAD TAX ACCOUNTANT located in Southfield, MI.
RESPONSIBILITIESPreparation of the quarterly and annual U.S. federal and state tax provisions and projections including rolling forward deferred tax accounts and income tax liabilities.Assisting with tax accounting consolidation including tax balance analysis as well as assisting with drafting the tax footnotes.Ensure and document that quarterly and annual tax accounting and tax compliance procedures comply with required SOX control objectives.Support the U.S. federal and state tax compliance processes including the return-to-provision analysis.Supervision of tax staff, including management of work streams, projects, and detail reviewProvide assistance with U.S. federal tax planning projects.Special projects, as assigned.
EDUCATION & EXPERIENCEBachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance or Business AdministrationCPA+5+ years tax experience within the tax function of a multinational publicly-traded corporation and/or public accounting firm, with US GAAP tax accounting exposureMaster’s degree in tax or other advanced degreeKnowledge of accounting and consolidations systems (SAP, HFM), tax reporting software (OneSource), and compliance software (OneSource).Background in U.S. federal and state tax lawsAdvanced experience with Microsoft ExcelExcellent interpersonal and communication skills (written and oral) with the ability to interact well with people of various backgrounds and levels.Strong time management skills with the ability to meet strict deadlines for tax compliance and US GAAP reporting needs.Strong organizational skill to ensure ability to prioritize workload and manage a number of projects at any one time.A positive, energetic and happy attitude. If you are a high performer and would like to work for an equally high performing company and you think the above opportunity is appropriate for you, we invite you to apply to this job and email your resume to: kroehrig@venteon.us.com.
We treat all resumes with strict confidentiality. We will always contact you first before submitting your resume to our client(s) for review. If you do not receive correspondence, you are not a fit for this position.
At Venteon our talent acquisition team is proud to provide our clients with the most qualified Accounting & Finance, Engineering, IT and Administrative talent in the industry today.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
